meanings.definition: A disease characterized by the growth of tiny collections of inflammatory cells in different parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: Sarcoidosis can cause small lumps of cells to form in the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with sarcoidosis after finding tiny inflammatory collections in her lungs.
meanings.sent3: When the tiny inflammatory cells throw a party in the body, it's called sarcoidosis.
meanings.sent4: Her body was like a garden where sarcoidosis grew tiny inflammatory flowers.
meanings.sent5: The growth of inflammatory cells in sarcoidosis is like a small army invading the body.

meanings.definition: An inflammatory disease that can affect multiple organs in the body.
meanings.sent1: Sarcoidosis is a disease that can harm many organs in the body.
meanings.sent2: The inflammation caused by sarcoidosis can spread to different parts of the body.
meanings.sent3: When sarcoidosis decides to visit multiple organs, it throws a party in each one.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a battleground where sarcoidosis fought in different organs.
meanings.sent5: The impact of sarcoidosis on multiple organs is like a storm wreaking havoc inside the body.

meanings.definition: A condition in which small lumps, known as granulomas, form in various organs.
meanings.sent1: Granulomas are the small lumps that develop in sarcoidosis within organs.
meanings.sent2: The formation of granulomas is a key feature of sarcoidosis affecting different organs.
meanings.sent3: When granulomas decide to party in various organs, it's called sarcoidosis.
meanings.sent4: Her organs were like a puzzle with granulomas as the missing pieces in sarcoidosis.
meanings.sent5: The presence of granulomas in sarcoidosis is like tiny marbles rolling around in different organs.
